import axios from"axios";export default{getBook:function getBook(query){return axios.get("https://googleapis.com/books/v1/vloumes?q=".concat(query));},// Deletes book using given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books"+id).then(function(result){return result.data;});},// Saves book to db
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData).then(function(result){return result.data;});},// Retrieve saved books from db
savedBooks:function savedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books").then(function(result){return result.data;});}};
